## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G03055](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G03055)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtD27, D27</u>
- **Gene Name:** A. thaliana homolog of rice D27, DWARF27
- **Description:**   beta-carotene isomerase D27-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
